original_text: Hear me, all people on the earth. I will cause great trouble for my people. I will punish them as a result of their wrong thoughts. They have not listened to my messages. They have turned against my law. Hear me, all people on the earth. I will cause great trouble for my people. I will punish them as a result of their wrong thoughts. They have not listened to my messages. They have turned against my law. Hear me, all people on the earth.
korean_text: 땅이여 들으라 내가 이 백성에게 재앙을 내리리니 이것이 그들의 생각의 결과라 그들이 내 말을 듣지 아니하며 내 율법을 거절하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: Hear me, all people on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 있는 모든 사람들아, 나를 들으라.

sentences.original_text: I will cause great trouble for my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성에게 큰 재앙을 일으킬 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will punish them as a result of their wrong thoughts.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 그릇된 생각 때문에 그들을 벌할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They have not listened to my messages.
They have turned against my law.
Hear me, all people on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 있는 모든 사람들아, 나를 들으라.

sentences.original_text: I will cause great trouble for my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성에게 큰 재앙을 일으킬 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will punish them as a result of their wrong thoughts.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 그릇된 생각 때문에 그들을 벌할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They have not listened to my messages.
They have turned against my law.
Hear me, all people on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 있는 모든 사람들아, 나를 들으라.
